pr_title: [DOCS] note breaking change from 7.8.1 in migration guide

timeline.message: [DOCS] note breaking change from 7.8.1 in migration guide

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            The GET /_license endpoint displays "enterprise" licenses as
          
          
            
            "platinum" by default so that old clients (including beats, kibana and
          
          
            
            logstash) know to interpret this new license type as if it were a
          
          
            
            platinum license.
          
          
            
            The <<get-license,`GET /_license`>> endpoint displays Enterprise licenses as
          
          
            
            Platinum by default so that old clients (including Beats, Kibana and
          
          
            
            Logstash) know to interpret this new license type as if it were a
          
          
            
            Platinum license.
timeline.author: lockewritesdocs
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -18,6 +19,26 @@ See also <<release-highlights>> and <<es-release-notes>>.
 
 //tag::notable-breaking-changes[]
 
+[discrete]
+[[breaking_781_license_changes]]
+=== License Information changes
+
+As of the `7.8.1` release
+
+.Displays enterprise license as platinum in /_xpack 
+[%collapsible]
+====
+*Details*
+The GET /_license endpoint displays "enterprise" licenses as
+"platinum" by default so that old clients (including beats, kibana and
+logstash) know to interpret this new license type as if it were a
+platinum license.

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            However, this compatibility layer was not applied to the GET /_xpack/
          
          
            
            endpoint which also displays a license type & mode. {es-pull}58217[#58217]
          
          
            
            This compatibility layer was not applied to the <<info-api,`GET /_xpack/`>>
          
          
            
            endpoint, which also displays a license type and mode. {es-pull}58217[#58217]

 //tag::notable-breaking-changes[]

+=== License Information changes
+
+As of the `7.8.1` release
+
+.Displays enterprise license as platinum in /_xpack 
+[%collapsible]
+====
+*Details*
+The GET /_license endpoint displays "enterprise" licenses as
+"platinum" by default so that old clients (including beats, kibana and

timeline.author: Mpdreamz
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -18,6 +19,26 @@ See also <<release-highlights>> and <<es-release-notes>>.
 
 //tag::notable-breaking-changes[]
 
+[discrete]
+[[breaking_781_license_changes]]
+=== License Information changes
+
+As of the `7.8.1` release
+
+.Displays Enterprise license as Platinum in /_xpack 
+[%collapsible]
+====
+*Details*
+The `GET /_license` endpoint displays Enterprise licenses as
+Platinum by default so that old clients (including Beats, Kibana and
+Logstash) know to interpret this new license type as if it were a
+Platinum license.
+
+This compatibility layer was not applied to the <<info-api,`GET /_xpack/`>>
